title: Marcelo Ebrard - Wikipedia
snippet: Marcelo Luis Ebrard Casaubón (Spanish: [maɾˈselo eˈβɾaɾð]; born 10 October 1959) is a Mexican politician and internationalist who has served as the secretary of economy since 2024. A member of the National Regeneration Movement (Morena), he previously served as secretary of foreign ...

title: Marcelo Ebrard
snippet: His political journey began with the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI), later transitioning to the Party of the Democratic Revolution (PRD), and currently aligning with the National Regeneration Movement (MORENA). Before assuming his current role, Ebrard served as the Mayor of Mexico ...

title: About: Marcelo Ebrard
snippet: Affiliated with the National Regeneration Movement (MORENA) since 2018, he was appointed to lead the foreign ministry by Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador on 1 December 2018.
